r.d: Package containes locale validation for Finland such as: * Postal Code * Telephone Number * Car License Plate Number * Motorbike License Plate Number * Personal Identity Number (HETU) * Unique Identification Number (SATU) * Business ID Number (Y-tunnus) * Party Identification Number (OVT-tunnus) * Value Added Tax Number (ALV-numero) * Bank Account Number (tilinumero) * Bank Reference Number (viitenumero) * Credit Card Number
r.n: - carLicensePlate(): Added new chars and first or only number cannot be zero. - bikeLicensePlate(): Added new chars and first or only number cannot be zero. - Added new unit tests. Thanks to Markku Uttula.
